1. In what situation would it be most appropriate for a trainer to use the Socratic Method in a corporate training session?
a) When presenting factual information that does not require analysis
b) When encouraging active participation and critical thinking
c) When delivering a lecture-style presentation without discussion
2. How can a teacher use the Socratic Method to promote engagement in a high school literature class?
a) By asking students to memorize and recite quotes from the text
b) By leading a group discussion without asking questions
c) By asking open-ended questions to encourage critical thinking and analysis of the text
3. In what scenario would it be most appropriate for a trainer to avoid using the Socratic Method in a workshop?
a) When leading a brainstorming session to generate new ideas
b) When facilitating a team-building exercise
c) When delivering a technical training that requires specific knowledge and skills
